description.ko: 네온 불빛과 비에 젖은 금속이 낭만적이면서도 산업적인 분위기를 자아내는 활기차고 우울한 사이버펑크 도시 풍경입니다.
description.en: A vibrant and moody cyberpunk cityscape where neon lights and rain-soaked metal create a romantic yet industrial atmosphere.

prompt: A high-angle cinematic view of a rain-slicked cyberpunk megacity canyon at night, saturated with #FF00FF and #00FFFF neon signage reflecting in hyper-realistic #1A0033 asphalt puddles. Futuristic urban textures of rusted #FF6B35 metal and wet carbon fiber. A massive holographic serpent weaves through the high-density spires. 8k, Unreal Engine 5, raytracing, cinematic volumetric fog, sharp focus on raindrops falling through neon beams, capturing the digital romance of a decaying futuristic metropolis.
